attributes.action: Cancel the increase in Vehicle Excise duty for vehicles in rural areas.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The owners of so called "Gas guzzlers" or "Chelsea tractors" within built up areas and cities should justifiably have an increase in the cost of road taxation to subsidise the cuts given to owners of small envoironment friendly cars. 
People living in rural areas need these vehicles to go about their daily buisness, these cars are not a luxury or a status symbol but a necessity.
There should not be a tax on living in a rural area!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
